layer.name: Responsibility
layer.definition: If it's in your life, it's yours to address.

questions.text: When I do something wrong, I ...

answers.4: realize it's on me, though I'm still working on my triggers
answers.2: can see how circumstances conspired against me
answers.3: own my part, but the situation set me up
answers.1: can usually understand why it wasn't really my fault

questions.text: When my actions hurt someone unintentionally, I ...
questions.principle: Own your impact, not just your intent

answers.4: own the impact, but I'm still struggling to go there first
answers.5: own what I did — what I meant doesn't change what I did
answers.2: apologize but explain why they shouldn't take it that way
answers.3: own my part, but make sure they understand my intent
answers.1: point out that I didn't mean to — intent is what matters

questions.text: When confronted with a moral failure, I ...

answers.4: own it, but my first instinct is still to explain
answers.5: own it — no defense, no deflection
answers.2: explain the context that led to it
answers.3: own a part, but need to be understood
answers.1: defend myself and point out what others did too

answers.4: mine to protect, though I sometimes let pressure compromise it
answers.5: mine alone — no one can give it or take it without my participation
answers.2: hard to maintain given my circumstances
answers.3: mine, but others can really damage it
answers.1: shaped by what others have done to me

questions.text: When I'm convicted of something, I ...

answers.4: address it, though I usually drag my feet
answers.5: address it — I don't wait for someone else to make me
answers.2: hope the feeling passes or circumstances change
answers.3: feel the weight, but often wait for a reason to act
answers.1: wait to see if anyone else noticed

remediation.advice: Responsibility for conscience means owning your moral choices without deflection. The mature response to 'you did wrong' is not 'but they...' or 'because circumstances...' — it's 'yes, I did, and here's what I'm going to do about it.'

scripture.text: Each one should test their own actions. Then they can take pride in themselves alone, without comparing themselves to someone else.
